rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmmm...
There just aren't any good people around...

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0002
rows.name: Do you know of Mannam Juice?

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0003
rows.name:
It's a traditional beverage that's been
drunk in the village of Pom since long ago!

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0004
rows.name:
It's a sweet and fragrant drink made by
aging Melosian Honey for a year!

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0005
rows.name:
We make it here in Torigoth, but it's not popular.
For some reason, it's only popular in Pom!

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0006
rows.name:
My husband has to transport it to the village,
but isn't it dangerous these days?

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm looking for someone who can provide
reliable protection on the cheap!

rows.label: tlk41400021_07_msg0008
rows.name:
Indeed, it seems I can trust
and rely on you!
